ComicInfo.Title: Get Your Gun, Pt. 1 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary:
NOW IN FULL COLOR! A great jumping-on point for new readers. With Zoey and several of her roommates possible suspects in the murder of Mandy Jenkins, Uncle Zeke is taken off the case to avoid a conflict of interest. Meanwhile, Zoey meets her â€˜fan' for the first time without masks.
